PLAYER-NAME.BUTTON: Apply name and go to screen with rooms

ROOM.H1: You are in room configuration. You can create room or join to already existing one
ROOM.P: Click on the room to join in!

FLEET-PLACING.BUTTON: Go to waiting room, to wait till opponent will place fleet!

OPPONENT-REGISTER.H2: Wait for someone to join you room. Estimated waiting time: 5 hours

OPPONENT-FLEET.H2: Wait for till that GOROL will place his fleet

GAME.BUTTON: Go to rooms ! And play again !
